post.description:
Resets the consecutive failure count and re-enables the subscription.

Requires the `webhook_subscription:write` ability.

abn.description: Australian Business Number (ABN). Must be 11 digits.

bsb.description: Bank State Branch (BSB) code. Must be 6 digits.

number.description: Bank account number. Must be 6-10 digits.

name.description: Individual's full legal name. Must include a space between first name(s) and last name (e.g., "John Michael Doe").

attribution_id.description: Attribution identifier for grouping related verifications.

abn.description: Australian Business Number (ABN). Must be 11 digits.

bsb.description: Bank State Branch (BSB) code. Must be 6 digits.

number.description: Bank account number. Must be 6-10 digits.

name.description: Individual's full legal name. Must include a space between first name(s) and last name (e.g., "John Michael Doe").

mobile.description: Individual's Australian mobile number. Required when `individual.confirmation_notification_method` is provided.

verification_mode.description:
Verification mode for the individual.
- `kyc`: Run full KYC to establish identity (biometric authentication on subsequent verifications).
- `biometric`: Biometric authentication with client-provided portrait image.
- `skip`: Skip individual verification entirely.

confirmation_notification_method.description: Notification channels to use for sending the confirmation link to the individual. When null, the URL is returned in API response. Must be omitted when `individual.verification_mode` is `skip`.

portrait_image.description:
Individual's government-issued ID portrait image. Required for biometric authentication when `individual.verification_mode` is `biometric`. The image must be a valid base64-encoded JPEG or PNG image up to 5MB when decoded. The data URI prefix `data:[MIME type];base64,` is optional.

Required when `individual.verification_mode` is `biometric`, otherwise it must be omitted.

events.description: The event types to subscribe to.

items.description: Each event type must be a valid WebhookEventType.

events.description: The event types to subscribe to.

items.description: Each event type must be a valid WebhookEventType.

status.description: The current status of the verification.

attribution_id.description: The attribution ID optionally provided upon creation.

confirmation_url.description: Confirmation URL returned when notification is manual (confirmation_notification_method is null)

status.description: The status of the delivery attempt.
The delivery status of the event.

webhook_url.description: The webhook URL the event was sent to.

events.description: The event types this subscription listens to.

secret.description: The signing secret. Only returned when the subscription is first created.

consecutive_failures.description: The number of consecutive delivery failures.

disabled_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time when the subscription was disabled, or null if enabled.

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
